description:
In this exciting sequel, Little Red Riding Hood, along with her loyal companions Liro and Faina, faces her biggest challenge yet: the fearsome Witch of the Enchanted Forest. After discovering that the witch plans to cast a spell on the entire forest and turn it into her dark domain, Little Red Riding Hood and her friends know they must act quickly to save their home and its inhabitants.

★ More than 80 full color backgrounds visually enrich the experience.

★ Soundtrack with 10 charming melodies that complement the atmosphere of the game.

★ Collection of over 80 images available to use as wallpapers.

★ Interactive map that allows exploration of 6 unique locations.

★ Immersive narrative with over 10,000 words that delve into the story and characters.
name: Little Red Riding Hood: Wonder Animals Vol.2
